EmuFlight

EmuFlight provides the best flying experience by creating a healthy work environment for developers and pilots of racing and freestyle drones. PR's welcome!

Download as .zip Download as .tar.gz View on GitHub

DShot 2400 and 4800 support (0.3.2+)

  • DShot was coded in a way that will not use significantly more CPU resources.
  • Most BLHeli_32 ESC will work with DShot2400
  • Only F3 based BLHeli_32 ESC will work with DShot4800
